# terrareg_git_provider (Data Source)

Data source for obtaining git provider

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "terrareg_git_provider" "example-by-name" {
  name = "Github"
}

data "terrareg_git_provider" "example-by-id" {
  id = 1
}
```
